msg: Provide an example of using the StreamWriterResponseContext.

author: ppoddar
msg: OPENJPA-449 : initializing _pcClassLoaders in constructor instead of conditionally inside loadPersistentTypes(). Saves NPE on new Broker construction in multi-threaded scenarios' openjpa-kernel\src\main\java\org\apache\openjpa\kernel\AbstractBrokerFactory.java
